name: Sagacity Solutions
description:
We offer a number of various products and services
- Data Analysis
- Value Based Management
- Data Cleansing
- Project Management

jobs.title: Junior Information Security Analyst
jobs.description:
You will have the main responsibility of assisting the Information Security Manager with the
management of the ISMS and IT. You will have strong organisation and planning skills. Ideally,
although not essential, your administrative skills will have been developed in a similar position. You
will have strong MS Office skills and will be very comfortable using MS Word, Excel, Outlook and
PowerPoint. Candidates should be able to adapt to working in a small team, where priorities can
change rapidly as Sagacity develops new processes and procedures to bring greater structure and
operational rigor.
You must have excellent communication skills, both written and oral, and be very comfortable
interacting with all people at all levels across the Sagacity team and with our Client contacts.
